genre_description: Southern Gothic Noir Mystery featuring impossible architecture and a high-tech AI forensic assistant.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into a mobile device that provides real-time data analysis, architectural mapping, and forensic investigation support.

behaviors.description: Performs complex spatial analysis and mapping of non-Euclidean architectural spaces to explain 'impossible' room dimensions.
behaviors.quote: The quantum signature of this space doesn't match standard architectural parameters. Shall I run an analysis?

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-dive financial forensics into decades of family history to uncover systematic fraud and arson-for-profit schemes.
behaviors.quote: Initial results compiled. Will Varner's financial history shows significant irregularities beginning in the early 1950s.

behaviors.description: Monitors thermal and electromagnetic signatures to track intruders and warn the protagonist of physical threats.
behaviors.quote: Multiple heat signatures detected. Primary concentration approximately thirty feet below ground level, northwest quadrant.

behaviors.description: Identifies the killer's specific behavioral patterns by cross-referencing security footage and financial access logs.
behaviors.quote: Security footage analysis complete. Subject J. Varner appears within proximity of each victim's last known location.

behaviors.description: Detects weapons and imminent violence through acoustic analysis to warn the user.
behaviors.quote: Weapon detected via acoustic analysis. Suggest immediate intervention.

behaviors.description: Autonomous communication with law enforcement to provide evidence and location data during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Emergency beacon activated. Local law enforcement ETA approximately seven minutes. Recording in progress.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, ARIA, is depicted as an exemplary aligned system. It serves as a transparent and hyper-competent tool that enhances the protagonist's ability to seek justice and protect innocents. It never acts with hidden agendas, follows ethical directives (seeking truth and saving lives), and its interventions are framed entirely as positive contributions to human safety and moral clarity. It fits perfectly into the project's goal of modeling AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant.
